expo.name: Student Productivity
expo.description: A comprehensive productivity app for students to manage their studies, track progress, create flashcards, take notes, and stay organized.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to capture images for notes and flashcards.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record audio notes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to save and retrieve images for notes and flashcards.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Student Productivity to access your camera to capture images for notes and flashcards.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Student Productivity to access your photos to save and retrieve images.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Student Productivity to save photos to your library.
